children.value: Overlay modules are the covering modules on the IDE, such as Dialog and Message modules. You can use this module when you need to notify the user of a message from the IDE or when you need a modal dialog box to interact with the user.
Message will pop up a prompt in the lower right corner of the IDE.
The following parameters take info as an example
Message specifies the body of the message, which can be a plain text message or a React component
Buttons are in the lower right corner of the popup, rendered from left to right. After the user selects them, the results are returned
Whether to display the close button. The default is true.

properties.ariaLabel: how long does it take for the message to pop up permalink

children.value: How long does it take for the message to pop up

properties.ariaLabel: how do i customize message components permalink

children.value: How do I customize message components
If you don't want to use the default message icon, you can customize the message component by the
The Dialog interface is consistent with the message, but the popup is modal
